parse.title: Gallery of flags of dependent territories

text.*:
This overview contains the flags of dependent territories and other areas of special sovereignty. Territories without a separate flag other than that of their controlling country are excluded.

Contents

  • 1 Australia
  • 2 Chile
  • 3 People's Republic of China
  • 4 Denmark
  • 5 Finland
  • 6 France
  • 7 Netherlands
    • 7.1 Countries
    • 7.2 Public Bodies
  • 8 New Zealand
  • 9 United Kingdom
    • 9.1 Crown dependencies
    • 9.2 Bailiwick of Guernsey
    • 9.3 British Overseas Territories
  • 10 United States
  • 11 See also
  • 12 References

United Kingdom[edit]

Constitutionally, neither the Crown Dependencies nor the British Overseas Territories are part of the United Kingdom. The Overseas Territories, Crown Dependencies and the UK form one Realm under the monarch.[1]

Crown dependencies[edit]

Flag of Guernsey
Flag of the Isle of Man
Flag of Jersey

Bailiwick of Guernsey[edit]

The Bailiwick of Guernsey includes the separate jurisdictions of Alderney and Sark.[2]

Flag of Alderney
Flag of Guernsey
Flag of Sark
